content.rendered:
Awards & Accolades

 

Recognized several times as the Best Residential Builder by the North Idaho Business Journal, Aspen Homes have become known as an elite custom home builder in the region over their 25+ years in the business. We have earned this reputation, in part, through our commitment to creating relationships with our clients and take seriously the role we play in our community by building our clients’ homes. This approach has allowed our team of builders, architects, project managers, and designers to work consistently with the area’s best sub-contractors and source high-quality materials. Our team is passionate about building beautiful, high-quality homes. And we’re committed to treating each client with the same care we would give our own families.

 

Our Founders

 

Focused on open dialogue and innovation, Aspen Homes creates homes with clever solutions to our client’s specific needs, aesthetic tastes, and property location. Looking at our portfolio you will see we embody the spirit of the Great Northwest. 

Founders Todd and Zetta Stam are both members of the North Idaho Building Contractors Association, an Idaho Registered Master Builder, Members of the Coeur d’Alene Regional Chamber, and are known for their showcase homes in the annual Parade of Homes. These showcase homes have brought them awards of distinction. The People’s Choice, Realtors Choice, Distinguished Builder to name a few. Aspen Homes has been featured on the cover of North Idaho Luxury Life Style, NSPIRE, Couer d’Alene Living Local, and Northwest Mining & Timber. They have been featured in the Home Stratosphere as Top 5 Custom Home Builders and made a splash in Houzz Magazine. This dynamic husband and wife duo were featured on HGTV and most recently named Power 50 Most Influential Professionals in the Northwest. With all of these accomplishments, the Stams would tell you their greatest life’s work is their family. 

Aspen Homes started with family, remains rooted in family, and focuses on making all clients family.

 

Memberships, Accolades, and Features

 

  • North Idaho Building Contractors Association
  • Idaho Registered Master Builder
  • Coeur d’Alene Regional Chamber
  • Parade of Homes
  • The People’s Choice
  • Realtors Choice
  • Distinguished Builder
  • North Idaho Luxury Life Style
  • NSPIRE
  • Couer d’Alene Living Local
  • Northwest Mining & Timber
  • HomeStratosphere Top 5 Custom Home Builders
  • Houzz Magazine
  • HGTV
  • Power 50 Most Influential Professionals in the Northwest
